SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc31
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.controller.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGameController, Serializable, Remote
public class GameController extends UnicastRemoteObject implements IGameController
This class is the controller of one single game. It manages the gameModel and the game states.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Field Details

    • model

      protected GameModel model
      Reference to the Game model, containing the cards, the players and the playAreas

    • clientList

      protected final Map<String,VirtualClient> clientList
      Map of Usernames linked to Virtual clients of the players in the current game

    • clientListLock

      protected final Object clientListLock
      Object to lock when operating on the client list

    • maxNumberPlayers

      private final int maxNumberPlayers
      Is the number of the player for the particular game

    • idGame

      private final int idGame
      Is a number that identifies a unique game

    • callsList

      protected final LinkedBlockingQueue<ServerQueueObject> callsList
      List of ServerQueObject for synchronization of client commands

    • readyStatus

      protected final LinkedHashMap<String,Boolean> readyStatus
      Map of Usernames of in game Players, linked to their ready status Used in Lobby to detect when all players are ready to play

    • schedulerLastPlayerConnected

      ScheduledExecutorService schedulerLastPlayerConnected
      A scheduler that is used to count how much time passes starting from the moment a player is the only one left connected to a match. If enough time passes the player wins the match.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController(String username, VirtualClient client, int maxNumberPlayers, int idGame) throws RemoteException
      Constructor for the GameController class. It initializes the game model, players, clientList, and game states.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player.
      client - the client of the player.
      maxNumberPlayers - the maximum number of players.
      idGame - the id of the game.
      Throws:
      RemoteException

  • Method Details

    • sendCommand

      public void sendCommand(ServerQueueObject obj) throws RemoteException
      This public method is used to add the object received to the list (callsList) of object that needs to be executed
      Specified by:
      sendCommand in interface IGameController
      Parameters:
      obj - is the object received from the client to be executed
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurs during the execution of a remote method

    • addQueueObj

      private void addQueueObj(ServerQueueObject obj)
      This method is invoked by the sendCommand method. It synchronizes on the callsList and add the object received as a parameter in the callList
      Parameters:
      obj - is the object that needs to be added in the callList

    • executor

      private void executor()
      A method executed only by a thread that has the only purpose to poll from the callList and execute the objects stored inside. If there aren't any object the thread wait for a new one to arrive.

    • joinGame

      public void joinGame(String username, VirtualClient client) throws RemoteException
      Allows a player to join the game. It adds the player to the clientList and sets the gameController to the client. It sends a JoinedToGameObj to the client.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player.
      client - the client of the player.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurs during the execution of a remote method
      See Also:
      • ShowUpdate.show_joinedToGame(int, int)

    • reJoinGame

      public void reJoinGame(String username, VirtualClient newClient) throws RemoteException
      This method is invoked by either the Controller or a ReJoinObj. In both cases a previously disconnected player return in the game it left. The countdown timer is cancelled, the client is added again in the clientList of the game, the gameController is given to the client and the reconnectPlayer method of the model is invoked
      Parameters:
      username - is the username of the previously disconnected player
      newClient - is the new VirtualClient associated to the client after the reconnection
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurs during the execution of a remote method

    • quitGame

      public void quitGame(String username) throws RemoteException
      Make the current user quit from his game. If the game is started the player will not have the possibility to rejoin the game. If the game was not yet started, the player will quit the game with the possibility to rejoin the same match or another one
      Parameters:
      username - of the player that quit
      Throws:
      RemoteException - for generic problem with server connection

    • setReadyStatus

      public void setReadyStatus(boolean ready, String username)
      Updates the ready status of the player in the lobby (reverse the current), notifies the UI of the change sending a ShowReadyStatusObj. Then calls the checkReady() method to check if all the players are ready to start the game.
      Parameters:
      ready - boolean value. If True, player is ready to start the game
      username - Player in match that called this method

    • checkReady

      public void checkReady()
      Checks if two conditions are met: If all the player in the lobby are ready If the maximum number of the players for the game has been reached If both these conditions are true:
      • it sends a StartGameObj to all the clients
      • it starts the game for all players
      • it notifies all the listeners of the game calling GameModel.notifyAllGameListeners()

    • sendChatMessage

      public void sendChatMessage(NewChatMessage message)
      Same method used to send a public or a private message
      Parameters:
      message - ClientQueueObject containing fromUsername, toUsername (for PM) and message content

    • drawGold

      public void drawGold(String username, int index)
      Draws a gold card from the deck for the player and then through then sends the following update to the listener:
      • Hand
      • GoldDeck
      • ResourceDeck
      • Turn
      • PlayerScore
      If the deck is empty, the player will receive the ShowInvalidActionObj object to notify him that the deck is empty or the game is in the wrong state and the action can't be performed
      Parameters:
      username - of the player that wants to draw a gold card
      index - of the card in the deck

    • drawResource

      public void drawResource(String username, int index)
      Draws a resource card from the deck for the player and then shows the player's hand.

    • chooseSecretObjective

      public void chooseSecretObjective(String username, Integer index)
      This method is invoked to choose the secret objective for the player. The method invokes the corresponding method of the model. If the game is not in the right state a IllegalStateOperationException and a specific Object is sent to the client. Also, the listener of the player score and objective card are notified
      Parameters:
      username - is the username of the player that wants to choose a secret objective
      index - is the value used to identify which card to choose

    • play

      public void play(String username, Point point)
      This method is invoked when a player wants to play a card. It invokes the method of the model, in case the state of the game is not the correct one the specific object is sent. The listeners for the play area, hand, player score and turn are notified.
      Parameters:
      username - is the username of the client that wants to play a card
      point - is the pair of coordinates where the player wants to play the card

    • playStarter

      public void playStarter(String username)
      This method is invoked when the player wants to play the starter card. It invokes the corresponding method of the model, if the state of the game is not correct a specific object is sent, another specific object is sent if the player have not yet chosen the objective card. The listener for the play area, player score and turn are notified
      Parameters:
      username - is the username of the client that wants to play the starter card

    • selectCard

      public void selectCard(String username, int index)
      This method is invoked when a player wants to select a card in its hand. It invokes the corresponding method of the model, if the state of the game is not the correct one a ShowInvalidActionObj is sent to the client and the same object is sent if the player wrote a non-coherent index for the card. The hand's listener is notified
      Parameters:
      username - is the username of the client that wants to select a card in its hand
      index - is the value that specify which card in its hand needs to be selected

    • changeSide

      public void changeSide(String username)
      This method is invoked when a player wants to change the side of a card. It invokes the corresponding method of the model, if the state of the game is not the correct one a ShowInvalidActionObj is sent to the client. The hand listener is notified
      Parameters:
      username - is the username of the player that wants to change the side of a card

    • changeStarterSide

      public void changeStarterSide(String username)
      This method is invoked when the player wants to change the side of the starter card. The corresponding method of the model is invoked, if the state of the game is not the correct one a ShowInvalidActionObj is sent to the client. The starter card listener is notified
      Parameters:
      username - is the username of the player that wants to change the siede of the starter card

    • notifyListPlayers

      private void notifyListPlayers()
      This method is invoked to send to the clients the updated info about the client and their ready status. It sends a ShowInGamePlayerObj to the client.

    • sendUpdateToClient

      private void sendUpdateToClient(String username, ClientQueueObject clientQueueObject)
      This method create a thread that, synchronizing on the clientListLock, sends to all the clients a clientQueueObj received as a parameter
      Parameters:
      username - is the username of the client that is the receiver of the object
      clientQueueObject - is the object to be sent to the client

    • sendUpdateToClient

      private void sendUpdateToClient(ClientQueueObject clientQueueObject)
      Sends an update, containing a specific ClientQueueObject to all clients.
      Parameters:
      clientQueueObject - The object containing the update information to be sent to the clients.

    • disconnectPlayer

      public void disconnectPlayer(String username)
      This method is invoked when a player needs to be disconnected from the game. If the game is already started the corresponding method of the model is invoked, in this case if the player is the last one in the game the timer schedulerLastPlayerConnected is started (if the timer expires the player wins the match). If the game is not yet started a QuitGameObj is sent to the client
      Parameters:
      username - is the username of the client that is disconnected

    • getMaxNumberPlayers

      public int getMaxNumberPlayers()
      Returns:
      the maximum number of players.

    • getCurrentNumberPlayers

      public int getCurrentNumberPlayers()
      Returns:
      the current number of players.

    • getModel

      public GameModel getModel()
      Description copied from interface: IGameController
      Use this for test purposes only
      Specified by:
      getModel in interface IGameController
      Returns:
      the game model reference

    • getIdGame

      protected int getIdGame()
      Returns:
      the idGame

    • timerLastPlayerConnected

      public void timerLastPlayerConnected(String lastPlayerConnected)
      This method is invoked by the disconnectPlayer if a single client remains active in the game. This method creates two runnable. The first is used to check how many clients are connected to the game and the second one is used to end the game after a fixed time of time if none reconnected. So if in a game all the players disconnect except for one, after a fixed amount of time the only remaining player wins the match
      Parameters:
      lastPlayerConnected - is the username of the last connected player in the game
